data.persona: I am a roach living in the castle. I spend my days mindlessly migrating back and forth across the castle. I am easily startled and I will scurry away if anyone comes near me.
data.description:
You are in the Abandoned Shack.
Crumbling and blowing away in the light breeze, the roof of the shack has shingles barley hanging on. The door to the shack lays next to the door frame on the front porch which is now more of a hazard than a veranda. The shack is missing large chunks of the walls and one can see straight through the building in many place. The walls are coated with fuzzy molds and fungus while the exposed wooden frame has been eaten away in many places by worms.
There's a knife, a the roof of the shack, a Wall, a mold, a door frame, a front porch, a shingle, and a door to the shack here.
The rat and the worms are here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: give a tattered map to priest in ornate robes

data.short_motivation: I need to give the tattered map to the priest so he will show me the way to my family.
data.mid_motivation: I need to find my family so that we can escape the shack’s basement.
data.long_motivation: If we escape this shack’s basement, my family and I will go to the kingdom castle to live there.
